title: Omitted sunnah acts of salah cuz people might object, is my prayer valid? #islam assim al hakeem
transcript: sh if I am praying in the Masid and um uh in the Masid while I am praying I do some things I like skip some things that are like like if I skip some things that are like Sunnah out of um the fear that since uh the local people don't do it they might uh think that I don't know how to pray or something so um would my prayer be invalid because or would this be considered showing off no this is not related to at all to the validity of your prayer and your prayer is 100% valid
